properties.name: camel.language.joor.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the joor language. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.language.joor.pre-compile
properties.description: Whether the expression should be pre compiled once during initialization phase. If this is turned off, then the expression is reloaded and compiled on each evaluation.

properties.name: camel.language.joor.single-quotes
properties.description: Whether single quotes can be used as replacement for double quotes. This is convenient when you need to work with strings inside strings.

properties.name: camel.language.joor.trim
properties.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks
